pages.title: Disclaimer
pages.text: Ore generation is configurable, so amounts and Y-levels are not explained here as they can vary considerably between worlds.

pages.A.title: Niter
pages.A.text: A soft mineral used as a source of nitrogen and potassium in fertilizer.
pages.B.title: Sulfur
pages.B.text: A reactive mineral used to cure rubber and make gunpowder.

pages.A.title: Cinnabar
pages.A.text: A scarlet mineral used to enhance ore yields.
pages.B.title: Bituminous Sand
pages.B.text: A sticky, black, highly viscous liquid suspended in sand. Appears in deserts & badlands.

pages.A.title: Tin
pages.A.text: A soft, lightweight metal valued for its versatility.
pages.B.title: Nickel
pages.B.text: A hard metal used in alloys less affected by heat.

pages.A.title: Lead
pages.A.text: A soft, dense metal with shielding properties.
pages.B.title: Silver
pages.B.text: A conductive metal prized for its radiance.

pages.A.title: Apatite
pages.A.text: A common mineral often used as dye or a source of phosphorous in fertilizer.
